title: Potato wedges with cheese and bacon
ingredients: ['4 large potatoes, cut into thick wedges', '60ml olive oil', 'salt, to taste', 'pepper, to taste', 'garlic powder, to taste', 'paprika, to taste', 'dried oregano, to taste', '240g bacon, about 6 rashers cut into small cubes', '250g grated Red Leicester cheese', '25g chopped spring onions', '2 to 4 tablespoons soured cream']
